content: Bo Dai's Homepage Bo Dai Home Selected Publications Teaching Selected Awards Team Software Services Address Contact Twitter I am an assistant professor at CSE in Georgia Tech. I am also affiliated with Google DeepMind as a staff research scientist. My principal research interest lies on Agent AI upon Generative Models, Representation, and Reinforcement Learning, aiming for creating agents with decision-making and planning ability through modeling the world.
